zone_thresholds.title: Zone Thresholds
zone_thresholds.description:
Tune thresholds for selected triggers.

Humidity above house average uses the selected rooms' average humidity compared to the whole-house average. The threshold is the delta in % points.

Condensation risk uses dew-point spread:
spread = temperature - dew_point
Lower spread = higher risk (air is closer to saturation).
The threshold is in degC of spread:
2 degC = Danger
4 degC = Risk
6 degC = Watch

Mould risk is derived from humidity + dew-point spread and normalized to levels:
Level 1 = Watch
Level 2 = Risk
Level 3 = Danger
So a threshold of 2 triggers when risk reaches Risk or Danger.

alert_add.title: Add Alert
alert_add.description:
Configure a high-priority alert automation.

Condensation and mould danger entities are provided by Humidity Intelligence. You do not need custom binary sensors for those triggers, but you may optionally provide one for the Custom trigger type.

ui_install.title: UI Cards
ui_install.description:
Select which UI layouts to export now. HI will write one file per layout to /config/humidity_intelligence_cards_<layout>.yaml and post a notification with the file path.

Configured alerts:
{configured_alerts}

Warning: The backend logic will work without UI dependencies, but the UI cards may render incorrectly unless the required custom cards are installed (card-mod, button-card, mod-card, apexcharts-card).

To load a card: open File Editor → /config/humidity_intelligence_cards_<layout>.yaml → copy the YAML → Dashboard → Edit → Add card → Manual → paste YAML.
